--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Joseph Reisinger <joeraii@c...> wrote:
> This is mainly for Thomas, but if anyone else is interested please
take a 
> look.
> 
> > Yes, I would be interested in taking a look at the code.  At least for
> > now to play with and to see what I can do.  I'll keep this group
> > posted on any progress and/or package i come up with.
> 
> I've put up a release of my python-based extensible reusable etc
genetic 
> algorithm framework. I made a stab at writing a readme file, but its 
> probably horribly incomplete. So if you have any questions please ask.
> 
> Note that this does not contain a working NEAT implementation. It
contains 
> stubs for adding the NN code, and has a complexifying GRN that is
based on 
> NEAT. It ought to be trivial to add in a full NEAT implementation,
though, 
> I just haven't found the time to do it.
> 
> Here is the link:
> 
> http://www.cs.utexas.edu/~joeraii/software.html
> 
> Joe
> 
> -- 
> 
> Joseph Reisinger
> http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/joeraii
